children.name: ReferenceNavigationBuilder(EntityType, String, InternalRelationshipBuilder)
children.summary:
<para>
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Data.Entity.Metadata.Builders.ReferenceNavigationBuilder`2"></xref> class.
</para>
<para>
Instances of this class are returned from methods when using the <xref href="Microsoft.Data.Entity.ModelBuilder"></xref> API
and it is not designed to be directly constructed in your application code.
</para>

syntax.content: public ReferenceNavigationBuilder(EntityType relatedEntityType, string navigationName, InternalRelationshipBuilder builder)
syntax.content.vb: Public Sub New(relatedEntityType As EntityType, navigationName As String, builder As InternalRelationshipBuilder)

parameters.description: The entity type that the reference points to.
The name of the reference navigation property on the end of the relationship that configuration began on. If null, there is no navigation property on this end of the relationship.
The internal builder being used to configure the relationship.

syntax.content: public virtual ReferenceCollectionBuilder<TRelatedEntity, TEntity> WithMany(Expression<Func<TRelatedEntity, IEnumerable<TEntity>>> collection)
syntax.content.vb: Public Overridable Function WithMany(collection As Expression(Of Func(Of TRelatedEntity, IEnumerable(Of TEntity)))) As ReferenceCollectionBuilder(Of TRelatedEntity, TEntity)

parameters.description: A lambda expression representing the collection navigation property on the other end of this relationship (blog => blog.Posts). If no property is specified, the relationship will be configured without a navigation property on the other end of the relationship.

return.description: An object to further configure the relationship.

syntax.content: public virtual ReferenceCollectionBuilder<TRelatedEntity, TEntity> WithMany(string collection = null)
syntax.content.vb: Public Overridable Function WithMany(collection As String = Nothing) As ReferenceCollectionBuilder(Of TRelatedEntity, TEntity)

parameters.description: The name of the collection navigation property on the other end of this relationship. If null, there is no navigation property on the other end of the relationship.

return.description: An object to further configure the relationship.

syntax.content: public virtual ReferenceReferenceBuilder<TEntity, TRelatedEntity> WithOne(Expression<Func<TRelatedEntity, TEntity>> reference)
syntax.content.vb: Public Overridable Function WithOne(reference As Expression(Of Func(Of TRelatedEntity, TEntity))) As ReferenceReferenceBuilder(Of TEntity, TRelatedEntity)

parameters.description: A lambda expression representing the reference navigation property on the other end of this relationship (blog => blog.BlogInfo). If no property is specified, the relationship will be configured without a navigation property on the other end of the relationship.

return.description: An object to further configure the relationship.

syntax.content: public virtual ReferenceReferenceBuilder<TEntity, TRelatedEntity> WithOne(string reference = null)
syntax.content.vb: Public Overridable Function WithOne(reference As String = Nothing) As ReferenceReferenceBuilder(Of TEntity, TRelatedEntity)

parameters.description: The name of the reference navigation property on the other end of this relationship. If null, there is no navigation property on the other end of the relationship.

return.description: An object to further configure the relationship.

item.name: ReferenceNavigationBuilder<TEntity, TRelatedEntity>
item.summary:
<para>
Provides a simple API for configuring a relationship where configuration began on an end of the
relationship with a reference that points to an instance of another entity type.
</para>
<para>
Instances of this class are returned from methods when using the <xref href="Microsoft.Data.Entity.ModelBuilder"></xref> API
and it is not designed to be directly constructed in your application code.
</para>

syntax.content: public class ReferenceNavigationBuilder<TEntity, TRelatedEntity> : ReferenceNavigationBuilder, IInfrastructure<InternalRelationshipBuilder> where TEntity : class where TRelatedEntity : class
syntax.content.vb: Public Class ReferenceNavigationBuilder(Of TEntity As Class, TRelatedEntity As Class) Inherits ReferenceNavigationBuilder Implements IInfrastructure(Of InternalRelationshipBuilder)

typeParameters.description: The entity type to be configured.
The entity type that this relationship targets.

inheritance.name: ReferenceNavigationBuilder
inheritance.summary:
<para>

an end of the relationship with a reference that points to an instance of another entity type.

<para>
